title: Ichinose Kyoudai wa Gaman Dekinai
original_name: 市ノ瀬兄弟はガマンできない
sinopse: The two step-brothers that were the inspiration for Hoshino's BL essay back in middle school have returned to the city after a long absence, and they even moved in next door to her. Hoshino quickly befriends the younger of them, but how will she compete against a mutual brother complex?
